prod_short_desc: Fight for the Mother Box with Batman’s Knightcrawler!
prod_long_desc:
Drive and crawl with Batman’s all-terrain vehicle and reclaim the Mother Box from the evil Parademons, in this exciting LEGO® DC Comics Super Heroes Knightcrawler Tunnel Attack set. The Knightcrawler features 4 posable limbs, each with 2-wheel tracks, plus dual 6-stud rapid shooters and an opening cockpit for Batman™. Includes 4 minifigures with weapons—including Batman’s Batarang, The Flash’s 2 Power Blasts and the Parademons’ handheld stud shooters—to ramp up the role-play battle action.
Build the super-flexible Knightcrawler and recover the precious Mother Box from the tunnels of Stryker’s Island!
As featured in the Justice League movie
Includes Batman™, The Flash™ and 2 Parademons minifigures
LEGO® DC Comics™ Super Heroes building toys are compatible with all LEGO construction sets for creative building
The Knightcrawler is over 3” high, 11” long and 7” wide in crawl mode
622 pieces – For boys and girls between the ages of 7 and 14 years old
